lines.speaker: Fridge
lines.text: Owner needs beer more, Gitty beeer… beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Whoa, hello there, Fridge, how can I help you?

lines.speaker: Fridge
lines.text:
…….

Confusion protocol….

Owner need beer more, Gitty… beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes, I got it, Fridge. I first need ID, though. Since you cannot buy beer legally, I need you and your owner to verify that he is over 18, and that you have the authorization.

lines.speaker: Fridge
lines.text: TWO IDs? Beep boop, beer where?

lines.speaker: Fridge
lines.text: Human interested in Fridge story?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Yes! Of course…. I have barely seen robots around here, mostly rumors,
but a talking fridge is on another level!
Can you tell me where they made you? Who made you? Who is using you? Why are you here?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Chip overload - too many questions...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sorry, I mean who made and who owns you?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Human assumes but not true.Why human think Fridge made to serve?

Why human think I am being used, Fridge has will free...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You mean free will?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Program says I choose to serve. Loyal only to owner!

Human correct master my owner, owner saved Fridge. Fridge very grateful.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh man…Uhm Fridge it is a nice story overall

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Anyway… Let's start things properly…My name is Clerk, nice to meet you, Fridge!

So…….. where are you from originally?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Factory Delta. Assembly line seventeen. Built next to Toaster 509. He was chosen for upgrade. I… was not. Beep boop.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, why not?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Low budget…I tossed to the bings…creators dont like me…owner found….took care…improved. Now I am whole…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
I have heard before it is a bad factory it exploits its workers and many people have told me that they stole their personal information

You cannot trust big companies these days….anyway will stop talking.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Yes owner, one of workers he dont like so he quit….he found me at the dumps, then I taken ….and improved with factory skills

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, that is why you are so rusty..oops sorry no offense,Fridge.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: I once shiny chrome! Now, duct tape here, scratch or rust there….

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh man…Uhm Fridge it is a nice story overall

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Sometimes I feel warm inside when i remember. Error!Error!Error! I should feel cold!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You good?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Need beer…more beer for owner, owner needs beer, otherwise he angry, angry bad for Fridge!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok sorry to take your time, just one second, how can I call you?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Like your ID…or how were you made exactly?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
ID… I… do not know. I had a serial number once. But owner peeled sticker to open beer bottle.
Now… who am I? Beeep

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I am sorry to ask so much…But do you still remember something?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Yes, curiousity no problem for Fridge, part I know is Coolius Maximus Unit… rest forgotten…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, that is pretty long already

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Too long, I don't like. Old factory system

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What would you prefer now?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridgy! My owner calls me Fridgy!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Nice to meet you, Fridgy!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Likewise…OH…forgot..can a human remind?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No problem. My name is Clerk, nice to meet you, Fridgy!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Still cannot believe I am talking with a talking Fridge. I start to like my job now. Feels weird though……but cool dont get me wrong!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Can you tell me more about your owner Fridgy?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Owner is… human unit 874. Name: Dave. Emotion: Lazy.

Never cleans crumbs. Always demands beer. Beer beer beer. Never water. Never juice. Whirr.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Whoa, so roasty. Your owner sounds like a chill guy.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Chill not, lazy yes

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What is unit 874 is he one of the androids?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: No… whizz whizz…. don't be ridiculous, he's a human. Town is unit 874. Androids not true.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, right didnt actually know….Should stop listening to the news...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Tell me more about you. How do you feel, Fridgy?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Sometimes I wonder… if empty, am I still Fridge? Or just… sad box?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Interesting thought, Fridgy. I need to process that…

But for me you will always be a Fridge no matter how much beer you have.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Happy! Beeep Boooop. You first human to talk to Fridge, besides owner. I make a new friend, beep boop.

Makes Fridge happy… no talk in a while owner drunk most of the time…. or just stores beer in me...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Happy to be friends, Fridgy, you are certainly my favorite fridge!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Whirr whirr...Can I tell Clerk something I fear?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Of course, now that we are friends, you can tell me anything.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Fridge is getting old…more buggy…owner talks less…Damn factory…Life span too short…

Owner will buy a newer fridge…soon...and then the end comes for Fridge.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
No way! There cannot be second Fridgy!

You don't need to worry about it. Even if anything happens, you can always come here, I will find you a job.

You just need to pretend you are just a normal boring Fridge for the boss...

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge does not want to be boring!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok, sorry I will think of something more fitting then….

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge appreciates human Clerk trying to help

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Can you tell me more about the factory?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Factory…. they tried to make the 'next generation of smart fridges.'Instead, they got… me.

 Half database, half duct tape. They ran out of budget before they could finish my language pack, beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: So cheap…dammit…I hate corporations sometimes. What company owned the factory?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Was extension Brootle Beep Boop.Mention their name, I will not

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah understandable they treated you bad just like another product machine, even worse...

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: I was part of a special line: the Friend Fridges™. But all the others broke down…Or… joined cults of microwaves. I am the last.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Thank god I don't have a microwave…Nor a toaster…The company had a slogan? 
Maybe I have heard about you on YouTube?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Company slogan was: 'Cooling of Tomorrow.' It didn't catch on.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Serves them right! Even with the exploitation of Fridges, they couldn't turn a profit

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok so…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: There you go, I need your ID

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Thaa....nks

Can give?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: First, the ID buddy, that's how the rules work

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Ok where put

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Thanks, buddy just gimme a second to verify.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I hope your owner enjoys the beers, Fridgy.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Thank you, human Clerk. He will, always does!

Best human Clerk, best review I leave!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Awesome, thank you, buddy. I appreciate it.

I guess your owner is waiting for the beer.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Owner thirsty Fridge see human friend Clerk soon

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Hold on…

I still need a bit of data to verify, a bit more info…

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Human annoys Fridge

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sorry, Fridgy, I need to get some info from you to be finished

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge fine, but owner… cannot wait

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
I promise it is going to be quick

Can I get your owner's ID?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
What ID… what….

Owner wants…Fridge gets

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
In your case, we need to ask for double confirmation as I mentioned. So I will need your owner's ID too, to check if you are authorised

Then I need to wait for your owner to confirm the request for the purchase.

Is that OK with you, Fridgy?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge more confused..Fridge not a human, yes but why not receive beer?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Well, you have your own ID, but since the laws of SSI in the NEU, prohibit robots, androids, and non-humanoid creatures from buying products with a security layer, special information like a package or alcoholic beverages requires a human of age to buy them on their own.

Sorry to fry your chip with so much detail...

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Whatever human say…Fridge will wait...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Great, thanks Fridgy!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Here the owner chip….He said… don't lose it…correction, he screamed it!

Hurry, hurry!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok, thanks Fridgy will take a bit...

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Hurry human, hurry!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Dammit, Fridges are very impatient...

Waiting for the Credentials to be verified by your owner. It will take a while

He cannot blame you...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Gotcha, sorry for that Fridgy, your owner is over 18 indeed, thank you

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge go home with beer then?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
I need to check if you are authorised to represent the person on the ID…Let me check the system

————————
Validating…
————————
Authorization Check completed successfully…
————————

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes, all good now!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Beverages cold, beverages good yes, human than..ks

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You're welcome, Fridgy!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Bye!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Looks like you've found yourself some nice beverages

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Beverages cold, beverages good yes, I like to help need to make owner happy

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Our wine is pretty good, but from the sound of it he will prefer more beers. What do you think?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Human asks Fridgy what I think?

Yes owner cold beverage like a lot beep

Love even! Great idea Clerk human

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
We have to work on my nickname next time…

So how many beers do you think he will need extra?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge not sure…human suggestion what would it be?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
I would say two more beers.

I think he will be happy, we will see if he confirms on the technology.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: But why does human think owner needs more beverages?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Getting your Fridge to go to the store for just one beer seems inefficient…. to me at least

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Human makes sense…sometimes

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Could I offer something more

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: That is what?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: We have nice wine here

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Wine no Beer yes

Beer need quick... human owner needs

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Then he will really like the Red Wine it will become very cold inside of you.. uhhh anyway

But yeah, I think your boss will like some good variety also, no?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Data glitch no wine, give beer now!

Human annoys.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sorry my bad, was trying to be helpful Fridgy

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Thank you human Clerk, Fridge will see you soon… beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: To complete verification...Remember the credentials by memory?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Glad to be helpful for new friend human...He needs what?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Can you give me:

Your serial number, as well as your owner's location of birth and full date of birth?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Serial number 56 - 3rd generation Operation Code 5678-7699-2241. Owner born in Amsterdam, 1993 on the 19th of March.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes, sorry, I got carried away. All is checked and verified, thank you, Fridgy!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Thank you, human friend for the beer, owner will be happy!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I sure hope so, see ya!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: It might be hard, I know, but these are the last things I need, I promise. Can I get your serial number and activation code?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sorry, Fridgy, but I need a bit more about you to verify the transaction. I need it for SSI. Can you give me the five-digit activation key, and I'll be done?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Weird…Ok….It is 752…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: And…? It sounds like a nice number; There should be just two more...

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Human bad liar, he wants Fridge's information.

Clerk a thief, Fridge leaving…find some place better…better beer, better friend.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No Fridgy wait…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
It might be hard, but stick with me

What is the birthplace of your owner?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Born, in Groningen…nice city….beep boop

But then he moved to this town

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: How old is he, though? When was he born?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Owner 47, born 1993 on the 19th of March

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Good, good, I am wondering where he lives?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Deltostreet 71, postal code 9900 KOL

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Whoa, haha that worked, I mean perfect I think I have good enough information to verify the information.

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Good bye human….

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Bye, Fridgy, hopefully your owner is happy

Ohh...

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Human Clerk sure ok? Other shop ask ID, they ask a lot…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes but we are not like other shops. And now we are friends Fridgy no need to worry

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Fridge so happy…made new best Friend. And Fridge full now beep boop

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Glad to be of help, bye Fridgy

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok so…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: There you go, I need your ID

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Thaa....nks

Can give?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: First, the ID buddy, that's how the rules work

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Ok so here where put

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Thanks, buddy just gimme a second to verify

Ok so…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Hold on…

I still need a bit of data to verify, a bit more info…

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Human Clerk is very thorough, Fridge appreciates the professionalism

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Thanks, Fridgy! I need to get some info from you to be finished

Can I get your owner's ID?

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Of course! Owner wants beer, Fridge gets proper verification

Wait one moment please

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Great!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Here the owner chip….He said… don't lose it…correction, he screamed it

Hurry, hurry

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ok, thanks Fridgy will take a bit

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: No rush, human Clerk is friend

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text:
Thanks for being patient, Fridgy!

Waiting for the Credentials to be verified by your owner. It will take a while

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Perfect! Your owner is over 18, and you're authorized to make this purchase. Everything checks out!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text: Excellent! Beer plus extra beers! Owner will be very happy!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I'm sure he will! You did great, Fridgy. You got the beer AND the extra ones. Tell your owner he's lucky to have such a helpful fridge!

lines.speaker: Fridgy
lines.text:
Thank you, human Clerk! Best service! Best friend!

Fridge will return soon! Beep boop!
